extendedInfo.description: Real time cartoon and painting effects displayed on your camera feed! See the world through a new, original, stylish and captivating lens, have a wonder in your own home and discover how cool is now your world in cartoon!This is the ultimate collection of cartoon/sketch/comic book/half tone/noir/neon and many other effects painted directly in your camera, no more boring post-effects, it's all real time, you simply won't stop wandering, wherever you are, having a look at things and cartoon-ize them!You can wave your phone around and see the world change before your eyes, take pictures using any of the stylish cartoon effects or apply them to your existing photos.REFUNDS:Please contact us if you have any issues with this App (we can't reply to Android Market comments), we will give you a refund and later notify you once we've fixed the problem. CURRENTLY WORKING ON:â Integration with more social networking sitesâ More filtersFAQ:â Iâve purchased the App, but I canât download it. Please check that you have good Internet connectivity and retry. If the problem persists, please contact us and we will provide a solution.â I have a Samsung device, and the gallery doesnât open sometimes. Please allow a couple of seconds after taking a picture before clicking the gallery button, on Samsung devices the gallery canât be open while running the media scanner.â Why do you require the NFC and INTERNET permissions?NFC is required to support Android Beam and INTERNET is required for the Facebook, Twitter and YouTube integration.VIDEO FAQ:â How can I play Paper Camera videos on my PC?Using any WebM player. We recommend Firefox or Chrome, however you might be able to use Windows Media Player or Internet Explorer if you install the right plugins.  â I can't play Paper Camera videos on my standard device gallery. You require Android 4.0 or higher for this to work, on older versions you can use the in-app video player.â I can't record video with Paper Camera on my new device, why? We've only enabled this feature on devices that we know can support it properly. However you can still try using unofficial video recording support.â How do I enable unofficial video recording support? In the settings menu. Let us know if this works properly on your device and we will officially enable it in future versions. Please note that you will have to be running Android 2.3.3 and have support for NEON instructions for this to work at all.â I've unlocked unofficial video support but I cannot playback my videos in Paper Camera, why? This is a known limitation on some devices, there are 3 workarounds for this:   - You can playback videos on your PC.  - You can use MX Video Player, if you enable software mode.   - Hopefully when your device will receive a 4.0 upgrade this issue will be fixed.LEGAL:This software uses code of FFmpeg licensed under the  LGPLv2.1 and its source can be downloaded here: jfdplabs.com/ffmpegThank you for your download! JFDP Labs monkey team.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love it, fun to make old pictures look cool. Or take new ones.
reviews.author: Ryan Kuhn

reviews.title: Great filters
reviews.comment: I love having fun with photos and this app allows just that. Excellent for me and my daughter having fun.
reviews.author: Marvin Drummond

reviews.title: When it works its fun
reviews.comment: Was great at first. Lots of fun but I paid my money and now it won\'t open. I click on it and it takes me to the Google play store and shows its installed but won\'t let me open it. Help I want to use it.
reviews.author: Jason Davenport

reviews.title: Love the App
reviews.comment: Easy to use, great interface quality of both videos and pictures come out great. The only problem I have with this application is that you cannot choose where you save your files. Make this an option and this will be a 5 star review.

reviews.comment: Doesnt work! No pic reflection or video..wth

reviews.title: black screen
reviews.comment: i just bought the app but the video isnt playing back,im just getting a blank screen.... i\'m using a galaxy s3 running 4.2.2 Any help would be appreciated.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Sometimes depending on how many processes running , it can hang up and even reboot. But overall it is an awesome artistic app!

reviews.title: Super fun
reviews.comment: I love taking pictures with my phone and I like the different effects available. Very simple to use.
reviews.author: Gisele Reaney Darcy

reviews.title: video portion of the program
reviews.comment: Made a couple of quick videos using app.  Files were saved in .webm format.  They\'ll play on my Galaxy, but can\'t synch and play on my laptop.  Keep getting \"corrupted file\" message.  Even tried converter, but get same message after transferring into pc.

reviews.title: Works great again on New 2013 Nexus 7!
reviews.comment: Dev updated app.  Works great and no more crashing on my new beautiful 2013 Nexus 7.
